snippet.title: Potion Tycoon | Early Access Recap Trailer - 1.0 Coming on October 4!
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1485690/Potion_Tycoon/
https://www.gog.com/game/potion_tycoon

Potion Tycoon is a management simulator with a witchy twist! Build and develop your very own magic shop. Manage resources, set up production lines, mix potions and sell them smartly to stay ahead of the competition. Welcome to the potion business!

Developed by Snowhound Games

http://www.snowhoundgames.com/
https://www.facebook.com/snowhoundgames/
https://twitter.com/snowhoundgames

-- Follow us on Twitter --
http://www.twitter.com/daedalic

-- Follow us on Facebook -- 
http://www.facebook.com/daedalic

http://www.daedalic.com
